name: Drinking Games - 3 best drinking games in 1 App!
name_original: Drinking Games - 3 best drinking games in 1 App!
description:
★Drinking Games! +100.000 downloads!★

For when you just don't have cards or dice, this App is the solution to keep playing your favorite drinking games on your iPhone/iPod!

Featuring the best 3 games in 1 App:

★King's cup (aka Kings, Kingsen, Ring of fire, Circle of Death)
Take turns in drawing cards and follow the rules!

★Mexxen (famous in Europe)
Roll the dice and bluff your opponents away!

★iPanic (reflex-test! highly addictive!)
Who has the slowest reaction!? Drink up!

Note: This game is used for entertainment purposes only and does not promote the misuse/abuse of alcohol. Remember, drink responsibly!
